Natural Logarithm of 0.5
===

> [Natural logarithm][ln] of 0.5.

<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var LNHALF = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-lnhalf' );
```

#### LNHALF

[Natural logarithm][ln] of `0.5`.

``` javascript
LNHALF === 0.6931471805599453;
```

<!-- </usage> -->

<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

``` javascript
var LNHALF = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-lnhalf' );

console.log( LN2 );
// returns 0.6931471805599453
```

<!-- </examples> -->
